AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: involved in the stop of RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; considered the behavior of vehicles' drivers in determining reasonable suspicion to stop; followed suspicious vehicles for approximately five minutes; conducted a roving stop; familiar with most vehicles on Farm-to-Market Road 2050; interacted with law enforcement during the traffic stop; involved in the arrest and questioning of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; location of questioning; had sufficient evidence to conclude that two vehicles were driving in tandem; agents were expected to arrive at the scene
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Officer Reymundo Reyes: conducted a traffic stop of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., noticed he was nervous and shaking during the interaction; issued a citation and impounded the black Dodge pickup truck due to unclear ownership and lack of insurance information; informed IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. that he needed to wait for the United States Border Patrol agents to arrive
defendant who was stopped by Officer Reymundo Reyes and felt not free to leave after being handed a citation; asked about bus times to leave but was told to wait for the United States Border Patrol agents
